title: Unban my account
body: Unban my account i wanna play urf!

replies.body:
If you believe you've been falsely punished, you'll need to appeal by submitting a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "Discuss a personal suspension or restriction" option). The Support agent will review the case and determine if there is a valid reason to remove/reduce the ban.

If you would like to share more details about the ban here, we may be able to discuss the situation further and give advice and/or information on the situation, though we wont be able to affect any action around the punishment itself.
